items.q: Where can I calculate my staking profit?
items.a: You can calculate your staking profit directly on this page using our interactive calculator. Simply choose a plan, enter the amount of TON you want to stake and the number of days — you’ll instantly see the projected profit.

items.q: How long does it take to receive rewards?
items.a: You receive rewards every day, starting within the next 24 hours after your stake is confirmed on the network. Funds are allocated automatically by TONStake.ai portfolio algorithms.

items.q: What is the minimum amount to start staking?
items.a: The minimum to start staking is 10 TON. Plans are tuned so that from 10 TON you can already start earning.

items.q: Can I withdraw my funds at any time?
items.a: Yes, you can withdraw at any time. Open your dashboard, choose “Withdraw” and confirm the transaction in your wallet — the funds will return to your address.

items.q: Are there any extra fees or hidden charges?
items.a: We don’t charge additional platform fees. The only costs are TON network fees (gas) for deposits and withdrawals. The platform itself is free.

items.q: How secure is my staking deposit?
items.a: Your funds are stored in smart contracts that follow TON security standards. We use vetted open-source contracts and run periodic security audits.
